description:
Exceptionally light, ascent-oriented tech bindings for ambitious ski tourers who like to be out in front of the crowds. The ISO toepiece has a wide platform that makes stepping in as easy as possible and the 38mm hole pattern provides excellent power transfer.

  • Anti Ice Pads in the base of toe prevents icing in critical areas
  • ISI Toe Piece intuitive step-in uses a wide platform and integrated stop to automatically position and align your boot
  • Pins click directly into the boot to reduce lifting force required to walk
  • Active length compensation in the heel allows up to 4mm of movement when the ski is flexed
  • Easy to operate climbing aids allows for a 0°, 5° and 9° position without rotating the heel
  • Fast Shift mode for quick shifting between walking modes
  • Alpinist heel with adjustable lateral release and 15mm of heel adjustment
  • Adjustable DIN ISO setting
  • Tech inserts required
  • Compatible with Kingpin Alpinist crampons (available separately)
name: Marker Alpinist 8 without brake
